main event: A bright, metallic object was observed hovering and accelerating rapidly over Dallas, Texas on May 25, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as a flattened oval or ellipse, appearing metallic and emitting a bright light.
The object hovered silently for approximately 30 seconds at a distance of about 300 yards from the witness.
The object then suddenly accelerated in a northerly direction and was out of sight in less than 10 seconds.
The sighting was made by a reliable witness, who was an airline pilot or police officer.
Similar incidents have been reported and forwarded to the Air Force for investigation.
sighted object: a bright, metallic, flattened oval or ellipse-shaped object
witnesses: an airline pilot and several police officers
